array.item:
Welcome to %1$s!

This tutorial will show you how to get started.

Touch the arrow to begin.

Draw on the canvas by dragging your finger on it.

You can also touch the pencil icon to toggle between the pencil and the eraser.

Touch the stroke icon next to the pencil icon to open the stroke menu.

It lets you choose a drawing color and how thick you want your strokes to be.

You can move the camera by putting two fingers on the canvas and dragging them along.

You can also zoom the camera by dragging your fingers together to zoom out, or away from each other to zoom in.

It\'s infinitely large!

You can move the canvas around as far as you like. As long as your device has enough free space, you can use as much of the canvas as you want.

You can reset the camera\'s zoom by touching the zoom icon.

You can also move the camera back to the middle by touching the position icon.

A sketchbook can have multiple pages, or sheets.

Touch the book icon to see a list of the pages in your sketchbook.

The highlighted sheet is the one that you\'re currently looking at.

You can rename or delete sheets by touching the icons next to them, and also reorder them by dragging the dots.
Open the main menu by touching the gear icon.
This menu offers many useful features such as saving your work, switching to left-handed mode, switching to dark mode, and switching between your device\'s internal storage and SD card.

That\'s all for the tutorial!

If you need to see it again, choose Help from the main menu.
